info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 04 at 5:24PM CDT until July 04 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN FORD COUNTY... At 524 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Gibson City, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Paxton, Gibson City, Melvin and Elliott. Including the following interstate... I-57 near mile marker 258. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
